examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Companies House to tell me about number
Alexa, ask Companies House for information on number
Get company number from Companies House
Tell me company details for number from Companies House
Alexa, ask Companies House to get the officers of number
Alexa, ask Companies House to tell me the officers of company number
Alexa, ask Companies House to tell me the officers in company number
Alexa, who are the officers of number from Companies House
Alexa, I want the officers of number from Companies House
en-GB.name: companies house
en-GB.description: Want to know your accounting and confirmation statement due dates? Alexa knows, Just say: Alexa, ask company house to tell me about <Company Number>. Want to know who the officers are of that company? Say: Tell me the officers of <Company Number>
